node.description: The one time password that is generated is valid for a very short duration, this allows construction of a URL that can be used once (in a short timeframe) where the resulting call can be run with the credentials of the one who requested the OTP. Most common usecase is secured file downloads. The OTP is coupled to a particular service. It can also be coupled to the device and/or a particular input correlation id for the service limiting the use to download for instance a specific file.
node.summary: Request a one time password to execute a particular service
